properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 4 at 3:11PM MST until February 7 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
...Another round of snow moves into the west and north Wednesday
evening through Friday...

.A series of weather systems will be moving into the northwest
Wednesday afternoon, bringing another round of significant snow
to the northwest and eventually across the west and north.
Moderate to possibly heavy snow will continue through Friday, with
the heaviest snowfall Thursday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to
17 inches possible.

* WHERE...Star Valley and Jackson Hole.

* WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Friday morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING
